name: 曾世杰
objective: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
schedule: 1.Temperature, Heat , and the First law of thermodynamics,The kinetic theory of gases 2.Entropy and the Second law of Thermodynamics. 3.Electric Charge,Electric Fields. 4.Gauss’ law. 5.Electric Potential. 6. Capacitance 7.Current and resistance 8.Circuits 9.Magnetic Fields 10. Magnetic Fields Due to Currents 11.Induction and Inductance 12. Electromagnetic Oscillations and Alternating Current. 13.Maxwell’s equations; Magnetism in matter 14.Electromagnetic Waves.15.Images 16.Interference
scorePolicy: 作業20%, 期中考40%,期末考40%
